br.p: Hello! My name is Rafael Setragni.
I'm a Full Stack developer, electronic technician and web designer, living in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.
Currently i've been working with many different technologies, front-end and back-end, low and high platform, each one focusing an different goal purpose.
I don't care about languages or frameworks. I want the task done.
A beautiful and intuitive user interface is just as important as well coded software.

br.br: And i love to create algorithms and heuristics! 💙
